summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Strava API integration in CardioCoach. All backend endpoints work correctly, UI shows generic 'Data Sync' section without Strava/Garmin branding, EN/FR translations work, and Garmin endpoints remain dormant in backend.

minor.issue: Returns 520 status code instead of 503 due to Cloudflare proxy
minor.impact: Very minor - error handling still works correctly, message is displayed to user

passed_tests: GET /api/strava/status returns correct connection status (connected: false)
GET /api/strava/authorize returns generic error when credentials not configured
POST /api/strava/sync handles 'Not connected to Strava' gracefully
Settings page shows generic 'Data Sync' section
Connect Account button visible when not connected
Not Connected status indicator displayed correctly
No Garmin references visible in UI
No Strava branding visible in UI (only in data-testid)
French translations display correctly for Data Sync section
Error message is generic when credentials not configured
Coach page works with AI analysis features
critical_code_review_comments: Backend error message was updated to be generic ('Data sync not configured') instead of mentioning Strava explicitly
seed_data_creation: None - using existing mock workout data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Strava OAuth integration is configured as placeholder - will return 503/520 on authorize when STRAVA_CLIENT_ID/SECRET not set. The UI is generic (no Strava/Garmin branding visible). Garmin endpoints are kept dormant in backend but removed from UI. To enable full Strava functionality, add real STRAVA_CLIENT_ID, STRAVA_CLIENT_SECRET, and STRAVA_REDIRECT_URI environment variables.
mocked_api_note: MOCKED: Strava OAuth endpoints require real credentials to fully test. Currently returns generic error message when credentials not configured.
